price: A lõkacin da suka shiga ga Dãwũda, sai ya firgita daga gare su. Suka ce: "Kada kaji tsõro, masu husuma biyu ne; sãshenmu ya zãlunci sãshe. Sabõda haka, ka yi hakunci a tsakãninmu da gaskiya. Kada ka ƙẽtare haddi kuma ka shiryar da mu zuwa, ga tsakar hanya."
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنۡهُمۡۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ خَصۡمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعۡضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا تُشۡطِطۡ وَٱهۡدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
